attributes.action: Get Our Angels The Rights They Desere!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why shouldnt our tiny babies born before 20 weeks get the help they deserve!   They are strong enough to make it through labour and 4 a while after so why not help them!    They are perfect have, 10 tiny fingers and toes, they are a boy or a girl, they have hair and even eyebrows and fingernails.

They are classed as a misscarrage when they are obviously a baby!  They are born perfect with no problems at all. 

They aint recognised with a birth and death certificate even tho we lower there tiny coffins into the ground.

We cry a thousand tears. we just want the help our babies deserve!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
